[Monk Moves](/Feats.aspx?ID=719) <actions string="" />
</title>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 227 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Monk](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=8)

**Prerequisites**
[Monk Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=715)

</column>

---

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed when you’re not wearing armor.
name: Monk Moves
